data.title: Kurt Aland Eds
data.meta_description: The Greek New Testament by ALAND, Barbara et al (eds) and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Good. No marks noted in text, black mark on end page, cover has slight bend, hc, no djAND AS ALWAYS SHIPPED IN 24 HOURS; and emailed to you a USPS tracking number on all orders; all books are sanitized and cleaned for your protection before mailing. PLEASE NOTE OVER SEAS BUYERS if the book extra large or heavy there will be additional postage due to the new US Postage rates.

Bonded leather. Third Edition. 926p plus 203p supplement in back. 3rd corrected ed. A red bonded leather flexible hardcover book in very good condition. Former owner's name else unmarked. Text clean, binding tight. New Testament in Greek. Supplement in the back titled A CONCISE GREEK-ENGLISH DICTIONARY OF THE NEW TESTAMENT prepared by Barclay M. Newman, Jr. Attached gold ribbon page marker. Color maps on endpapers. This is the Third Edition printed in 1983.

Hardcover. Condition: Good. 2nd edition, 7th printing. 920p. Oversize. Ex-library hardcover book in original binding. Label residue on spine, stamps on endpapers and title page, and sticker in back. Otherwise a clean, tight book in very good condition. Side-by-side Greek and English text. The English text is in Today's English Version. Measures approx. 11" x 9".

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. 110 pp in German and 671 pp in Greek. Book/dust jacket condition: Fine- ()previous owner's name in ink to ffep)/na (as issued). A tight, clean book with the cloth ribbon intact. "Explanation signorum" laid in - also Fine- (minimal annotation). All orders are processed and shipped from MI or WI, USA.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. First edition. Two volumes, octavo (published in 1986 and 1989). ix, [2], 171, [1, ad]; lvi, [2], 418pp. Publisher's light grey cloth, lettered in gilt. Very good, ex-library set, with clean text, solidly bound. Comprises the first two volumes (of three) of Das Neue Testament auf Papyrus. Series: Arbeiten zur neutestamentlichen Textforschung, vols. 6; 12.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. First edition. Two volumes, octavo. [10], 545, [1]; [4], 353, [3, ads], 62 ("Egänzungsliste," separate in wrappers as issued, housed in sleeve at rear)pp. Publisher's light grey cloth, lettered in gilt. Very good, ex-library set, with clean text, solidly bound. Comprises two volumes (Gospel of Luke) of the six in part 4 (The Synoptic Gospels) of the "Text und Textwert der griechischen Handschriften des Neuen Testaments." Series: Arbeiten zur neutestamentlichen Textforschung, nos. 30; 31.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. First edition. Two volumes, octavo. [8], 23, [1], 517, [3, ads]; [4], 327, [1, ad]; 61 ("Egänzungsliste," separate in wrappers as issued, housed in sleeve at rear). Publisher's light grey cloth, lettered in gilt. Very good, ex-library set, with clean text, solidly bound. Comprises two volumes (Gospel of Matthew) of the six in part 4 (The Synoptic Gospels) of the "Text und Textwert der griechischen Handschriften des Neuen Testaments." Series: Arbeiten zur neutestamentlichen Textforschung, vols. 28; 29.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. First edition. Two volumes, octavo. viii, [2], [12], 648; [4], 695, 82 ("Egänzungsliste," separate in wrappers as issued, housed in sleeve at rear)pp. Publisher's light grey cloth, lettered in gilt. Very good, ex-library set, with clean text, solidly bound. Comprises the complete two-volume set of part 5 (The Gospel of John) of the "Text und Textwert der griechischen Handschriften des Neuen Testaments." The over 1700 Greek manuscripts with a continuous text of St. John's Gospel available today are compared at 153 sampling points, and all the variants at these points are documented. A quantitative evaluation makes it possible to select the relevant manuscripts for an Editio Critica Maior of St. John's Gospel. In addition, a new process is introduced for also grouping the manuscripts of the Byzantine text-type (publisher's note). Series: Arbeiten zur neutestamentlichen Textforschung, vols. 35; 36.
